name: Christoph's Mediterranean Spinach and Sun Dried Tomato Dish
author: Amy37
summary: This is a side dish that my husband throws together when he's in the mood for something light and quick. It can be served as a side dish with pasta or with some pan-fried eggs anytime.
ingredients: 6  sun-dried tomato halves packed in olive oil with herbs, cut into strips
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir baby spinach in hot oil until very tender, about 5 minutes
Season spinach evenly with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder, turning with tongs while sprinkling
Add tomatoes; cook and stir until tomatoes begin to soften, about 90 seconds
Sprinkle with feta cheese off heat and toss to serve
